description: Detailed means test calculation - only required if 122A-1 shows income above median

fields.notes: If 122A-1 Line 12b <= Line 13b, this entire form may not be needed

notes: This form has 135 fields for detailed expense deductions. Most fields need user input (rent, food, transportation, etc.). Only required if income exceeds state median on Form 122A-1. PDF field names verified via PDFFormReader.
